meanings.sent1: I will retile the bathroom floor next weekend.
meanings.sent2: The contractor had to retile the kitchen after the old tiles cracked.
meanings.sent3: After the cat knocked over the plant, I had to retile the floor with new tiles.
meanings.sent4: She decided to retile her roof to give her house a fresh new look.
meanings.sent5: The sunroom looked brand new after we retiled the entire floor.

meanings.sent1: We need to retile the patio before the party.
meanings.sent2: The homeowner chose to retile the fireplace for a modern touch.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped a hammer and had to retile the damaged area.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to retile the mosaic to enhance its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen will look amazing once we retile the backsplash.
